checkoutTermsAndConditions: All sales are final. We do not offer refunds or exchanges for products or gift cards. Reward points have no cash value and may not be transferred or combined. Performance of any cosmetic service is at the sole discretion of our medical staff. If you are not an appropriate candidate for a cosmetic service you have purchased, the purchase amount may be applied towards another cosmetic service or products that are available on our store.

businessInfo.verbiageForShipmentConfirmationForTreatm:
Thank you for your order from GLO Laser & Med Spa. You can check the status of your order by logging into your account. Once your package ships we will send a shipping confirmation. If you ordered a cosmetic service, you may schedule your appointment through our {Appointment Request form}. You may also call us at 713-595-8501 or email us at {store email} to schedule an appointment.

NOTE: LINK APPOINTMENT REQUEST FORM TO https://glolaserandmedspa.com/Contact-Us
